name: Pie! Pie! Pie!
description:
This is just a vertical slice of the game!

This game was developed by 3 students as a project for evaluation.

Pie! Pie! Pie! is a platformer side-scroller about the story of a nameless adventurer who seeks to make the ultimate apple pie, while exploring various parts of the world in search of diferent types of apples to succeed in his mission.

While in search of the mighty apples, something strange is happening in the world around him.

Will he achieve in making the most gracious pie of all time?

What about the mysteries of the world surrounding him?

Known bugs:

If the player dies, collectibles respawn.

The player will sometimes be able to move while text is on the screen.
